pr_title: running tests with remote agent hangs forever #4469

timeline.bodyText: This seems an unwanted side effect. We already add me to the launcher above. Jamming into the project seems wrong. Every time you launch, you will add it again, no? I think some other solution is needed.
timeline.author: bjhargrave
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -83,6 +83,14 @@ protected void updateFromProject() throws Exception {
 
 		launcher.addRunBundle(me.getFile()
 			.getAbsolutePath());
+
+		//
+		// We also add it to the project to handle the case of the remote
+		// launcher that wants to sync the bundles with the runtime dynamically
+		//
+
+		getProject().getRunbundles()

replies.bodyText:
There's no other way. the remote launcher is blowing away the runbundles set using launcher.addRunBundle.
I'm open to other options.
replies.author: rotty3000

replies.bodyText:
the tester gets the launcher instance
the tester calls prepare() where it adds the tester bundle to launcher runbundles
the tester then calls getProjectLauncher().launch(); which calls launcher.prepare() which calls launcher.updateFromProject(); which calls runbundles.clear();

Also, RemoteProjectLauncherPlugin inherits from aQute.bnd.build.ProjectLauncher which has https://github.com/bndtools/bnd/blob/master/biz.aQute.bndlib/src/aQute/bnd/build/ProjectLauncher.java#L148
replies.author: rotty3000

timeline.bodyText: Doesn't this just stack up side effects since the system properties are not restored when done?
timeline.author: bjhargrave

replies.bodyText: I'm open to other solutions. We'd have to rewrite a testers to get information via some other means. I can't see that happening in short order. This at least is a short term yet pretty safe fix. No one else cares about these properties... and the ONLY way to hand over -runproperties in the remote use case.
replies.author: rotty3000

replies.bodyText: I guess we could track the original value if any and then reset... I can add that.
replies.author: rotty3000

timeline.message:
[remote] enable the agent to set system properties

this enables the tester to set it's tester properties when running in a remote configuration

fixes #4469
